src:
Ličenje za jesen
Na kaj pomislite ob besedi jesen? So to nove družinske obveznosti, toplejša garderoba in čas za druženje ob kostanju ali pa vam srce takoj zaigra ob misli na živopisne barve, s katerimi nas v tem času razvaja narava?
04 Nov 2019, 08:22 by P. I.



FOTO: Notino



V sivem vremenu bodite drznejši pri izbiri barve šminke. FOTO: Notino



Tangle Teezer je idealen za razčesavanje las, tudi mokrih. FOTO: Notino


Če ste ena od tistih, ki z otroško navdušenostjo še vedno pričakujete mestne sprehode po šumečem listju ter lovljenje navdiha in miru v gozdu, vam prehod v jesen zagotovo ne predstavlja težav. V nasprotnem primeru pa ste se najbrž le težko poslovili od toplih poletnih dni in potrebujete nekoliko več spodbude za uživanje v tem letnem času.Veselo naličenePomembno je, da si v vsakem letnem času poiščete nekaj, kar vas bo razveseljevalo, pri tem pa ne pozabite poskrbeti zase. Ste ličila že zamenjali s takšnimi, ki bodo ustrezala odtenku vaše kože jeseni, da garderobe sploh ne omenjamo? Ne glede na vaš slog ličenja obstaja nekaj zakonitosti, ki jih je dobro upoštevati. Jesen je recimo primeren čas, da zaradi temnejših oblačil, ki jih je vsak mesec več, nekoliko potemnite tudi svoje obrvi – in pri tem seveda ne zanemarite njihove nege.


V sivem vremenu bodite drznejši pri izbiri barve šminke. FOTO: Notino

Jesen je tudi čas, ko smo lahko nekoliko bolj drzni pri ličenju oči. Ste si vedno želeli ustvariti videz mačjih oči, jih nekoliko bolj obrobiti ali pa eksperimentirati z večernim ličenjem z zlato barvo? Uživajte! S prehodom leta v drugo polovico je tudi čas za globino, zato se poigrajte z različnimi odtenki, toplimi, zabrisanimi linijami, ki segajo od rdeče do olivno zelene. Tudi pri ličenju ustnic ste zdaj lahko nekoliko drznejši in tako popestrite meglena jutra; vendar ne pozabite, da ni priporočljivo hkrati močno naličiti oči in ustnic! Če ste se denimo odločili za šminko v vijoličastem odtenku, oči poudarite samo z maskaro.Pri vsem skupaj pa je zelo pomembno, da so vaša ličila kakovostna – sicer svojemu telesu ne delate nobene usluge. Prav tako je v času, ko vse pogosteje nosimo kape in druga pokrivala ali pa zaradi vetra za krajše poti uporabimo vsaj kapuco, priporočljivo imeti pri roki krtačo, s katero vaši lasje ne bodo spominjali na ptičje strašilo ali pustno masko.Med izdelki za razčesavanje las, ki so vam na voljo, je v Veliki Britaniji najbolj priljubljena znamka Tangle Teezer. Ima ergonomsko obliko, ščetine različnih dolžin in je primerna za uporabo tako na suhih kot mokrih laseh, zato nanjo poleg frizerskih velemojstrov prisegajo tudi mame. Te namreč vedo, kako pomembno je, da krtača svoje delo opravi dobro in čim hitreje ter s čim manj bolečega razčesavanja.


Tangle Teezer je idealen za razčesavanje las, tudi mokrih. FOTO: Notino

Če se še niste pripravili na nov letni čas, si vzemite popoldne zase ter ob najljubši glasbi pospravite omaro in tople puloverje postavite na vidno mesto. Pripravite si tudi prenosno kozmetično torbico, ki bo z vami kljubovala slabemu vremenu! Predvsem pa uživajte v vsem lepem, kar vam prinaša letošnja jesen.
text:
Makeup for the fall
What do you think about the word autumn? Are these new family responsibilities, a warmer wardrobe and a time to socialize with chestnuts, or does your heart immediately start to think of the colorful colors that nature is spoiling us with during this time?
04 Nov 2019, 08:22 by P.I.



PHOTO: Notino



In gray weather, be bolder when choosing your lipstick color. PHOTO: Notino



Tangle Teezer is ideal for combing hair, even wet ones. PHOTO: Notino


If you are one of those who with childlike enthusiasm still expects city walks through the effervescent foliage and the pursuit of inspiration and peace in the woods, the transition to autumn is certainly no problem. Otherwise, you probably just had a hard time saying goodbye to the warm summer days and need a little more incentive to enjoy this time of year. for myself. Have you replaced your makeup with one that will match your skin tone this fall, not to mention the wardrobe? Regardless of your makeup style, there are some laws that are good to follow. Autumn, for example, is a good time to darken your eyebrows a little more each month because of the darker clothes - and, of course, do not neglect their care.


In gray weather, be bolder when choosing your lipstick color. PHOTO: Notino

Autumn is also a time when we can be a little bold about eye makeup. Have you always wanted to create the look of a cat's eyes, trim them a bit more, or experiment with evening gold makeup? Enjoy! Transitioning into the second half is also time for depth, so play around with different shades, warm, blurred lines that range from red to olive green. Even with lip makeup, you can now be a little bolder to brighten up misty mornings; but keep in mind that it is not advisable to have strong eyes and lips at the same time! For example, if you have opted for a lipstick in a purple tint, emphasize your eyes only with mascara. However, it is very important that your makeup is of good quality - otherwise you do no favors to your body. It is also advisable to have a brush that will not remind you of a bird scarecrow or a carnival mask during a time when we are increasingly wearing hats and other headgear, or at least using a hood due to wind. available to you is the most popular Tangle Teezer brand in the UK. It has an ergonomic shape, bristles of various lengths and is suitable for use on both dry and wet hair, which is why moms swear by hairdressers. They know how important it is for the brush to do its job well and as quickly as possible and with as little pain as possible.


Tangle Teezer is ideal for combing hair, even wet ones. PHOTO: Notino

If you are not yet ready for the new season, take the afternoon with you and put on your closet with your favorite music and put warm sweaters in a prominent place. Also, prepare a portable cosmetic bag that will withstand the bad weather! Above all, enjoy all the beauty that this fall brings to you.
